name: Pip's Journey (Rainstorm Interactive)
description:
Overview

Welcome to Pip’s Journey! You play as a pip, the smallest observable part of the soul, as you launch yourself through levels to find out more about yourself and what lies beyond. Use your newfound power as a pip to tilt platforms and launch yourself off jump pads. However, make sure to avoid the reapers that patrol the islands. If they see you, you better start running. Also, keep an eye out for runes while you’re traversing the islands. They depict concept that may aid you in your adventure. Finally, don’t forget to collect the essence you need to power the portal, or you’ll never escape this place.

 A short student-made game demoing a fun tilt-based concept. It is our first ever game that we all made together and was a joy to work on!

Enjoy playing!

Made By:

Emma Beukes (Producer/Artist) 

Amanda Milliken (Concept Artist/2D Artist)

Cameron Lentz (Programmer) 

Nick Vaskelis (Programmer/Composer) 

Haydon Tarvin (Environment Artist/Level Designer) 

Alex Reichenberger (Programmer/Level Designer)
